long_description: Offering 100% UV protection from the sun on bright days, the Pepper's Trigger polarized sunglasses are a great choice for sun fun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Grilamid(R) nylon lightweight frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Matte grey frames feature brown polarized lenses with a blue mirror coating for reduced glare and true color perception in bright light. Pepper's Trigger polarized sunglasses are designed to fit a medium-sized face.
short_description: Offering 100% UV protection from the sun on bright days, the Pepper's Trigger polarized sunglasses are a great choice for sun fun.
